title: parallel/progress indication is missing, too many duplicate logs
body:
`install -r` (or `clone` with subsequent `get -r --no-data` if you prefer that way) many subdatasets , ATM is really suboptimal:

```
$> datalad get -J10 --no-data -r .
[INFO   ] Installing Dataset(/tmp/abcd-bids) to get /tmp/abcd-bids recursively 
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time) 
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
install(ok): /tmp/abcd-bids/sub-NDARIXXX (dataset)                                                                                                                                                            
install(ok): /tmp/abcd-bids/sub-NDARIXXX (dataset)                                                                                                                                                            
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
install(ok): /tmp/abcd-bids/sourcedata (dataset)                                                                                                                                                                     
install(ok): /tmp/abcd-bids/sub-NDARXXX (dataset)                                                                                                                                                            
... some more of those....
install(ok): /tmp/abcd-bids/derivatives/abcd-hcp-pipeline (dataset)                                                                                                                                                  
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)                                                                                                                                                      
Installing:   0%|▏                                                                                                                                                         | 19.0/18.4k [00:03<02:50, 108 datasets/s]
0.00 [00:00, ?/s]                                                                                                                                                                                                    
Receiving:   0%|  
```

- overall progress from parallel somehow gets lost (a wild guess - upon the moment when it receives the full list of datasets)
- we stop reporting new records since now waiting for all of them to come before we report that many identical were received
- screen gets flooded with all those `INFO` messages on scanning the unlocked files

I do not have clear ideas yet on how we should approach (besides somehow suppressing identical log messages)  and/or implement (besides -- the first one about overall progress loss seems like a separate issue, may be related to recent refactoring of progress bar id, may be it morphs into a new one when total gets adjusted or smth like that)
